round_3: Boozlo is India's 1st e-commerce luxury concierge marketplace for party essentials.
round_4: Boozlo is an e-commerce luxury concierge platform based in India. They offer a wide range of party essentials, including mixers, barware, cocktails, bartenders, entertainment, and snacks, all available for purchase through their online platform. Customers can conveniently browse and order from their curated categories and enjoy convenient delivery to their doorstep.
